name: Escape from Infinity
description: "Escape from Infinity" is a haunting and mind-bending 3D project developed for a university assignment. Step into a world of endless dimensions as you navigate through a room that defies physics and logic. Unravel dark secrets, solve twisted puzzles, and decipher cryptic clues to unlock the path to freedom. But beware, as the room constantly shifts and changes, your grip on reality may slip, and the line between nightmare and reality blurs. Can you keep your sanity intact and find a way to escape from the infinite loop of terror, or will you become lost in the never-ending maze forever?
